messages.message: cc @Arjun let's make sure that we have the appropriate user notification for this. GPT-4 is significantly more expensive that GPT-3 and we don't want to surprise customers. cc @melissa.amos for copy
cc @Varun Jain for GPT-4 pricing update
@Bastiane so this is only available internally. I’ve been waiting for the green light from product side to open up to external users. I agree pricing is the missing piece here
this thread has most of the discussion around this decision: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C052YKRTJP5/p1698715099548999

Thanks for the clarification, Arjun. On the product side, we are working on updating the pricing based on GPT-4 Turbo cost. And we should be able to offer advanced models to customers once that's done
sounds good — will wait for an update from you/product team before enabling externally

@Bastiane - Are we looking to introduce the GPT-4 model option in Build before we roll out the broader revisions on AI Hub pricing that we’ve been discussing? If yes, when do we want to do that? cc: @hannah
